**Prerequisites**
- [ ] I am using the latest git commit of PatchBukkit on my server
- [ ] I am using the latest git commit of Pumpkin-MC as my server

**Plugin**  
Please describe the plugin you want to be supported, send a link to the plugin's GitHub repository if possible.

**Logs / Error Messages**  
What errors did you encounter while trying to use the plugin? Be as specific as possible.

**Additional Notes**
